products.name: Hamburger Helper Lasagna Pasta Sauce Mix

extendedInfo.detail: Made with real cheese. Pasta& Italian-style sauce mix.  Per 1/3 Cup as Packaged: 140 calories; 0 g sat fat (0% DV); 580 mg sodium (25% DV); 6 g total sugars. See nutrition facts for as prepared information.  Contains bioengineered food ingredients. Learn more at Ask.GeneralMills.com.   Add ground beef.  Naturally flavored. Questions? Call 1-800-828-3291. www.HamburgerHelper.com. Looking for more ways to add your own fresh twist? Visit HamburgerHelper.com.  Box Tops for Education: No more clipping. Scan your receipt. See how at btfe.com.
extendedInfo.ingredients: Enriched Pasta (Wheat Flour, Niacin, Ferrous Sulfate, Thiamin Mononitrate, Riboflavin, Folic Acid), Corn Starch, Sugar, Salt, Modified Whey, Tomato (Dried), Contains 2% Or Less Of: Spice, Garlic (Dried), Onion (Dried), Citric Acid (Dried), Vegetable Oil (Canola, Soybean And/or Sunflower Oil), Basil, Oregano, Malic Acid, Palm Oil (Dried) (Palm Oil, Lactose, Sodium Caseinate, Potassium Phosphate),Color (Yellow 5&6, Yellow Lakes 5 & 6, Red 40 Lake), Parmesan Cheese (Milk, Cultures, Salt, Enzymes), Maltodextrin, Nonfat Milk (Dried), Yeat Extract, Silicon Dioxide (Anticaking Agent).
extendedInfo.directions: For food safety and quality, follow the cooking directions. Refrigerate leftovers. You will need. 3 cups hot water. 1/2 cup milk. 1 lb lean ground beef or ground turkey or 1 lb ground Italian sausage. (1) Cook: Cook ground meat in 10-inch skillet over medium-high heat 6 to 8 minutes, breaking up and stirring. Drain; return cooked meat to skillet. (2) Stir: Stir in hot water, milk, sauce mix and pasta. Heat to boiling. (3) Simmer: Reduce heat. Cover; simmer about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until pasta is tender. If necessary, uncover and cook, while stirring, an additional 1 to 3 minutes to desired consistency.  Try with ground sausage instead of ground beef. Add your own twist! Add some zip and zest. Stir in red pepper flakes and diced tomatoes before simmering. Just before serving, sprinkle with shredded parmesan cheese.
extendedInfo.warnings: Contains milk, wheat. May contain egg and soy ingredients.
